# DOMException
ecmascript-binding/es-exceptions/DOMException-constants.any.html,PASS
# Fails because Cobalt IDL type 'exception' is enumerable.
ecmascript-binding/es-exceptions/DOMException-constructor-and-prototype.any.html,DISABLE
# Fails because Cobalt converts undefined to the DOMString "undefined" rather
# than taking on the default value specified in the IDL.
ecmascript-binding/es-exceptions/DOMException-constructor-behavior.any.html,DISABLE
# Fails because typeof DOMException does not match typeof Error.
ecmascript-binding/es-exceptions/DOMException-custom-bindings.any.html,DISABLE
# Fails because iframes are not supported.
ecmascript-binding/es-exceptions/exceptions.html,DISABLE
